sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import Template from '../components/Template' const ReportSumSalePerMonth = () => { const [years,setYears] = useState(()=> { let arr = []; let d = new Date(); let currentYear = d.getFullYear() let lastYear = (cr) return arr; }) return ( <> ) } export default ReportSumSalePerMonth
